multiplier-story.text: Junior + AI. A junior with AI is a faster junior. They ask AI how to do X. They debug AI output line by line. The AI helps, but it's still a junior working faster.
Your Experience. But you have something juniors don't: years of pattern recognition. System design intuition. The ability to spot architectural problems at a glance. This changes everything.
The Multiplier. AI doesn't replace senior engineers—it multiplies them. Experience times AI amplification equals unprecedented capability. Ten years of experience times AI equals 100x impact.
Senior + AI. You don't ask AI how to code. You direct AI to implement your design. You validate AI output instantly because you've seen these patterns thousands of times before.
A New Category. A senior with AI is an entirely different category of engineer. Your years of experience become superpowers when combined with AI velocity. This is your unfair advantage.

paradigm-story.text: Traditional Senior Role. In the traditional model, senior engineers create value through doing. Write the most complex code. Be the bottleneck for hard problems. Review code line by line.
Individual Output. Value equals individual output. How much code can you write? How many bugs can you fix? This model is about to become obsolete.
AI-Amplified Senior. The new paradigm: value through directing. You design systems, AI implements. You review at the architectural level while AI catches the details.
Team Amplification. Value equals team amplification. How many problems can you multiply your solving across the team? Mentoring becomes teaching AI leverage. Your impact scales.
The Architect Role. This is the evolution: from senior engineer who does, to senior architect who directs. Your experience becomes the compass. AI becomes the velocity.

strategy-story.text: Four Strategies. This course teaches four strategic approaches to multiply your impact. These aren't about using AI—they're about leveraging AI with your experience.
Rapid Acquisition. Strategy one: Understand any codebase in hours, not weeks. AI maps dependencies, traces data flows, identifies patterns—with you as the navigator. Chapter 1.
System-Wide Debugging. Strategy two: Trace bugs across service boundaries. Root cause analysis at scale. Turn days of investigation into hours. Chapter 2.
Platform Integration. Strategy three: Design robust integration points. AI generates the glue code while you focus on contracts and error handling strategies. Chapter 3.
Architectural Direction. Strategy four: Express architectural intent, let AI draft implementation. Your design decisions, AI's execution speed. This is the amplification point. Chapter 4.
